attributes.action: Prosecute the director and the Trustees of the Tate for misappropriation of public funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no point in arguing about whether or not an unmade bed or a glass of water are works of art because the phrase work of art has no precise meaning; but these objects could be reproduced easily,so they cannot be worth the sums which the Tate paid fo them . It is against the law for the Tate to prchase a work done by one of the trustees, but a few years ago the Tate paid £650,000 for a painting done by one of the trustees.
It is quite obvious that junk masquerading as art offers the most convenient opportunity for laundering money ever imagined.
 If the government is seriously concerned about illegal drugs this should be stopped at once.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
